      • getInstance

      • openCard

        public int openCard(int cardType,
                    BytesTypeValue atrBytesValue)
        Memory card to open the card interface.
        Parameters:
        cardType - Refer toMemoryCardType
        atrBytesValue - The returned ATR data.
        Returns:
        0: Success; Other values: Error code. Refer toErrCode

      • close

        public int close()
        This method is used to power down the memory card.
        Returns:
        0: Success; Other values: Error code. Refer toErrCode

      • sendApdu

        public int sendApdu(byte[] sendData,
                    int dataLen,
                    byte[] apduResponse,
                    int[] apduResponseLen)
        Memory card sends APDU interface.
        Parameters:
        sendData - The APDU data.
        dataLen - The length of APDU.
        apduResponse - The response data returned by the memory card.
        apduResponseLen - The length of response data returned by the memory card.
        Returns:
        0: Success; Other values: Error code. Refer toErrCode
